biography:
Ethan Peck (born March 2, 1986) is an American actor. He is best known for his work in the ABC Family network television series 10 Things I Hate About You, where he portrayed Patrick Verona, a role originated by Heath Ledger in the movie of the same name. Peck is the grandson of the late legendary actor Gregory Peck, and his first wife, Finnish-born Greta Kukkonen.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Ethan Peck, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
name: Ethan Peck
